segments.text: What will I earn per year in this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can expect to earn sixty-five thousand dollars per year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are we covered by a good benefits plan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The job has a menu plan where you are given a fixed amount of money and you choose what you most need in terms of benefits .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we take personal days off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You get 2 weeks paid vacation and an additional 10 days of sick leave .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you offer in terms of a retirement plan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We do not currently offer any retirement plan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you reimburse for education that relates to my job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We allow several weeks release time each year for our employees to attend job-related seminars and conferences .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a benefits brochure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whoa ! Who said you got the job ?
segments.speaker: S2
